html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-11192020-12-18,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC,  PARKS,  TB
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Amending the Remission Order in Respect of Non-residential Leases and Licences of Occupation Under the Administration of the Parks Canada Agency
PrecisOrder amending the REMISSION ORDER IN RESPECT OF NON-RESIDENTIAL LEASES AND LICENCES OF OCCUPATION UNDER THE ADMINISTRATION OF THE PARKS CANADA AGENCY in order to (1) extend the rent relief available to Parks Canada’s commercial tenants to September 30, 2020; and (2) extend the application deadline to December 31, 2020.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2021-0001 Publication Date: 2021-01-06
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Amending the Remission Order in Respect of Non-residential Leases and Licences of Occupation Under the Administration of the Parks Canada Agency
precis: Order amending the REMISSION ORDER IN RESPECT OF NON-RESIDENTIAL LEASES AND LICENCES OF OCCUPATION UNDER THE ADMINISTRATION OF THE PARKS CANADA AGENCY in order to (1) extend the rent relief available to Parks Canada’s commercial tenants to September 30, 2020; and (2) extend the application deadline to December 31, 2020.
